scripts.buildjsx:HeaderComponent: npm run buildjsx:SelectedLayout && npm run buildjsx:Status && npm run buildjsx:Menu && jsx app/views-jsx/HeaderComponent.jsx > app/views/HeaderComponent.js
scripts.buildjsx:DashboardView: npm run buildjsx:WellcomeBox && npm run buildjsx:CarsPane && npm run buildjsx:NewCarForm && jsx app/views-jsx/DashboardView.jsx > app/views/DashboardView/DashboardView.js
scripts.buildjsx:WellcomeBox: npm run buildjsx:UserRegistration && npm run buildjsx:SummaryStatistics && jsx app/views-jsx/DashboardView/WellcomeBox.jsx > app/views/DashboardView/WellcomeBox.js
scripts.buildjsx:DetailsView: npm run buildjsx:CarDetailsPane && npm run bulidjsx:EditCarForm && npm run buildjsx:AccordionWidget && jsx app/views-jsx/DetailsView.jsx > app/views/DetailsView.js
scripts.buildjsx:AccordionWidget: npm run buildjsx:AccordionBar && npm run buildjsx:CarDetailsPane && npm run buildjsx:FillupsView && npm run buildjsx:Reminders && jsx app/views-jsx/DetailsView/AccordionWidget.jsx > app/views/DetailsView/AccordionWidget.js
scripts.buildjsx:FillupsView: npm run buildjsx:FillupView && npm run buildjsx:FillupDetailsView && npm run buildjsx:NewFillupForm && jsx app/views-jsx/DetailsView/FillupsView.jsx > app/views/DetailsView/FillupsView.js
scripts.buildjsx:CarsBox: npm run buildjsx:CarCard && jsx app/views-jsx/CarsBox.jsx > app/views/CarsBox.js
scripts.buildjsx:CarCard: npm run buildjsx:CarStats && jsx app/views-jsx/CarCard.jsx > app/views/CarCard.js
scripts.build: npm run buildjsx:CarsBox && npm run buildjsx:HeaderComponent && npm run buildjsx:DashboardView && npm run buildjsx:DetailsView && npm run buildjsx:app && npm run build:webpack
